div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1003 Nymphaeum (mod. Geroevka, for- merly Ä–l'tigen), S of Kerch', Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1880? Burial: 5th cent. B.C.? Contents: c. 100 AR Bosporus: AR ("silver Bosporan coins of the same small size ... with different types") Disposition: museum material lost during war DAK 1881, no. 7, pp. 8, 49
